StringTable.Label: SubspaceSplinterB_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases Ships Moves, and partially jams enemy weapons

StringTable.Label: SubspaceSplinterM_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases Ships Moves, boost beam damage of all ships in fleet.

StringTable.Label: SubspaceResonatorP_Dec
StringTable.String: Substantially boost the Sensor power of a single ship.

StringTable.Label: SubspaceResonatorM_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the Sensor power of a single ship.

StringTable.Label: AncientPromethionCleanserP_Dec
StringTable.String: Substantially boost Ships Range of a single ship.

StringTable.Label: AncientPromethionCleanserM_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the Ships Range of a single ship.

StringTable.Label: AtomicBonderB_Dec

StringTable.Label: AtomicBonderP_Dec
StringTable.String: Substantially boost the Hit Points of a single ship.

StringTable.Label: PlasmaArcP_Dec
